## Flow Control
```
x=5;
if(x>3){
  print
  ("x > 3");
}else{
  print
  ("x <= 3");
}


x=5;
if(x>3){
  print ("x > 3");
} else if (x ==3){
  print ("x == 3");
}else{
  print
  ("x <= 3");
}

for(i in 1:10){
  print(i);
}

sum=0
for(i in 1:100){
  sum= sum+ i;
}
sum

sum(1:100)


ary = rep(NA, 100)
for(i in 1:100){
  ary[i]= i;
}
ary

ary2 =c()
for(i in 1:100){
  ary2 = c(ary2, i);
}
ary2

seq_len(5)

mat = matrix(1:9, byrow=TRUE, nrow=3)
for(i in seq_len(nrow(mat))) {
  for(j in seq_len(ncol(mat))) {
    cat(mat[i, j], " ")
  }
  cat('\n');
}

sum = 0;
cnt = 0;
while(cnt <= 100){
  sum = sum + cnt;
  cnt = cnt + 1;
}
sum
```
